page.title: 30Hairstyles in Timsbury
page.content:
This is about a survey that we took home and interviewed our parents and here are the results that came back to school about peoples favourite hair styles.

One person liked Lego hair the most. 7people preferred bobs. 7 people liked long hair. The number of people who loved pony tails was 3.

I person liked D.A.s they're cool he said. 1 person liked a bald head. 1 person liked army cut hair style.

By Rhiannon and Holly

Traffic Survey



2 weeks ago on a Monday morning at 9.30am, we completed a traffic survey, next to the Co-op in North Road. This is one of the busiest roads in Timsbury and one of the smallest. We counted the cars, motor-bikes, vans, cars, truck, tractors, scooters, bus, land rover and range rover.

Here are our findings of the vehicles that passed us in the half an hour:

0 motor bikes

15 vans

55 cars

2 trucks

1 tractor

1 scooter

1 bus

By Sam. Jake and Jordan.

We found out that cars are the most popular vehicle in which to travel to work. 8 people said they worked in Bath, 1 person worked in Bristol, 3 work for sales, 1 person works at home , 2 people work at St Mary's. However, there are some important businesses in Timsbury which we went to investigate further.
Luke
